Articles.Content:
Ok, here it is the task, its to fly around kerbin and land back at KSC, seems easy enough but you can\'t go over 15,000 meters and has to be in a space plane. no parts allowed to detach during flight or fall off. Then land back on the KSC runway or well around it. Plane must be launched horizontally and has to all be vanilla parts.

Good Luck!!!

infi-glide glitch

plus it will take hours with 2x time compression
